attributes.action: deny the recognition of Scientology under UK law as a religious organisation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scientology is not a religion, it is a money-making corporation that exploits vulnerable people, extorts money from its followers and harrasses those who seek to oppose it. 
We, Students against Scientology, ask that the UK government answers our call and that it does not legitimise Scientology or any of its questionable practises by granting it religious (and thus tax-exempt) status.
Scientology is cult, despite its celebrity face.

rejection.details: The Government does not grant "recognition by law" of any religious groups.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
